flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, Shawna was short of 30 - 12 = <<30-12=81>>81 situps
On Tuesday, Shawna was short of 30 - 19 = <<30-19=11>>11 situps
On Wednesday, Shawna would have to do 30 + 81 + 11 = <<30+81+11=122>>122 situps

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
